name: Opticspy
body:
###Python module opticspy Opticspy is a python module for optics application. I want to this for a long time. One reason is I know both optics and python, so why no develop some optics tools? The second reason is that there is not much opensource, easy-to-use optics program module(matlab has great fuctions but do not specify to optics application). I want this could be developed in to a core for a future web application for optics. ### What I want
  • 1. After import the module and you will get some functions that can use to do some calculation and education in optics
  • 2. Parameters should be very flexible, and the results should be shown in visualized, intuitionistic figures.
  • 3. After development of core, I want it be dynamic web application(with Javascript)
### What I want to contain in the module I think the module should contain bunch of things in optics.
  • 1. Diffraction: generate diffraction pattern
  • 2. Geometric matrix calculation
  • 3. PSF, OTF and MTF calculation
  • 4. Several interferogram(Twyman Green, Shearing, etc)
  • 5. Ray tracing
  • 6. Zernike coefficients
  • 7. Third and high order aberration caculation
### What I have done > [Here](http://sterncat.github.io/files/opticspy_1.html) is some example of this opticspy module.
  • 1. Rectangular, circle diffraction pattern, OTF
  • 2. Third order ray abberation plot
  • 3. Twyman_Green interferogram with aberration
  • 4. Lateral Shear interferogram with aberration
  • 5. Zernike Coefficient
